mapper.sql: JID, JGoodsCode, JGoodsName, JModel, JUnit, JMemo, JClassID, JSupClientID, JBarCode, JPointSalePrice, JSale3Price, JSale4Price, JSale5Price, JWholesalePrice, JRefCostPrice, JMinInPrice, JMaxInPrice, JMainProductsMark, JNoUse, JAuxClassID1, JAuxClassID2, JSupplyType, JPurchPeriod, JSeasonID, JBrandID, JPlace, JSex, JPyCode, JPosIntegral, JClrPrice, JAuthorisationCode, JQualityPeriod, JUseAuxID, JTaxRate, JDrawingNumber, JWeigh, JChangePrice, JRetailDiscRate, JSale6Price, JSale7Price, JJointDisc, JTaxPointSalePrice, JTaxWholesalePrice, JTaxSale3Price, JTaxSale4Price, JTaxSale5Price, JTaxSale6Price, JTaxSale7Price, JMaterialID, JSize, JColorID, JHuaJianID, JClassID2, JClassID3, JTotalUseQty, JMakeRule, JShareUse, JEditDeptID, JGoodsAttribute, JModifyTime, JAttributeID, JPluCode, JHashCode, JCounterID, JCubage, JWeight, JIsOnSale, JGoodsTypeID, JMarketPrice, JListPicID, JGoodsKeyWords, JSalerecord, JVisitrecord, JDetailName, JPostageType, JDeliveryType, JDeliverTo, JDeliverDate, JPickTime, JNoIntegral, JServiceRate, JSourcePlace, JQualityPeriodMonth, JNetContent, JEndDate, JStoreageMethod, JPackingModel, JBurdening, JNutrientContent, JNoDisc, JLevelID, JMinOrderQty, JCountryUnitCode, JCityUnitCode, JCustomStatusID, JPostMartDate, JIsTop, JMonthSaleQty, JMonthSaleRanking
mapper.select:
select JID as jid, JGoodsCode as jgoodscode, JGoodsName as jgoodsname, JModel as jmodel, JUnit as junit, JMemo as jmemo, JClassID as jclassid, JSupClientID as jsupclientid, JBarCode as jbarcode, JPointSalePrice as jpointsaleprice, JSale3Price as jsale3price, JRefCostPrice as jrefcostprice, JMinInPrice as jmininprice, JPhoto as jphoto, JPlace as jplace ,
, (select JStockQty from VAuxGoodsStock where JGoodsID = JID) AS number FROM dbo.TGoods where JID in (select j_id from TTwokindBill where j_twokind_id = #{0})

select aa.JID as jid, aa.JGoodsCode as jgoodscode, aa.JGoodsName as jgoodsname, aa.JModel as jmodel, aa.JUnit as junit, aa.JMemo as jmemo, aa.JClassID as jclassid, aa.JBarCode as jbarcode, convert(decimal(10, 2),aa.JPointSalePrice) as jpointsaleprice, convert(decimal(10, 2),aa.JSale3Price) as jsale3price, convert(decimal(10, 2),aa.JRefCostPrice) as jrefcostprice, convert(decimal(10, 2),aa.JMinInPrice) as jmininprice, aa.JPlace as jplace, isnull(aa.JSubtitle,'') as jsubtitle, isnull(aa.JBigPhoto,'') AS jbigphoto, isnull(aa.JLitPhoto,'') as jlitphoto, isnull(aa.JPhotoScript,'') as jphotoscript, cc.j_number as number, cc.j_goodsmoney as goodsmoney FROM dbo.TGoods aa left join dbo.TOrderDetailed cc on cc.j_goodsid = aa.JID where cc.j_orderid = #{0} and aa.JID in (select j_goodsid from dbo.TOrderDetailed where j_orderid = #{0})
